Class Entity

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Observable implements Serializable
An abstract base class for all dynamic game objects, such as the player and enemies. It provides fundamental properties like position, dimensions, and a hitbox. It extends Observable to allow other parts of the application (like the view) to be notified of its state changes.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(Point initialSpawn)
      Constructs an Entity at a given initial spawn point.
      Parameters:
      initialSpawn - The starting coordinates for the entity.

  • Method Details

    • initHitbox

      protected abstract void initHitbox()
      Initializes the entity's hitbox. Concrete subclasses must implement this method to define the specific shape and size of their hitbox.

    • updateHitbox

      protected void updateHitbox()
      Updates the hitbox's position to match the entity's current coordinates. This should be called whenever the entity moves.
